m.detail:
Shrine of Evil: DC 20 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    affects good creatures which touch the shrine, DC 13 save or take 4d10 damage

details.history: The dungeon was created by a cult of elemental earth as a stronghold. It was eventually conquered by invaders, and has been attacked and abandoned many times since then.
details.temperature:
Cold (DC 10 Constitution save each hour
    or gain one level of exhaustion)

monster: Bandit Captain (cr 2, mm 344) and 3 x Bandit (cr 1/8, mm 343); hard, 525 xp

Treasure: 300 cp, 10000 sp, 2500 gp, 120 pp, 2 x black onyx (150 gp), diamond (100 gp), pearl (100 gp), amber (100 gp), chrysoberyl (100 gp), 3 x coral (100 gp), spinel (100 gp), Potion of Supreme Healing (very rare, dmg 187)
detail.room_features: A narrow ledge runs along the north and east walls, and someone has scrawled "Kill them with acid" on the south wall

wandering_monsters.1: Water Weird (cr 3, mm 299); medium, 700 xp, lost and desperate
wandering_monsters.2: 3 x Hobgoblin (cr 1/2, mm 186); medium, 300 xp, hunting for food
wandering_monsters.3: Silver Dragon Wyrmling (cr 2, mm 118); easy, 450 xp, gathered around an evil shrine
